text: 2.3 Mat 4.17, Mak 1.14, Luk 1.2, Hib 10.28-29, 12.25 Kɨlop anɨgak ak mɨñɨl pen, God chɨnop tɨg asɨk dup ak, tap awl yɨbɨl. Anɨb ak chɨn God chɨnop tɨg asɨk dup ak kud ñɨl ma nɨgɨnɨgabun ak, tɨtay dɨnɨgabun? Pɨlɨk amnɨgun tek ma lɨnɨgab. Nɨgɨm. Ned Bɨawl ne takaw tep anɨb ak agek, binɨb ogɨnap nɨgɨlak. Kɨli nɨŋɨd, chɨnop pen agñel chɨn nɨŋɨd nɨgɨnok, takaw anɨb ak nɨŋɨd yɨbɨl yek.
